Entries.Mon8: #$1 Caroline23#When we first moved to Pelican Town I would take secret walks to the {{Wizard Title}}'s tower. She used to show me some very... *ahem* fun spells. Don't tell Pierre, he has jealousy issues.#$e#Abigail was born about a year after we moved to Pelican Town. I wonder if she'll ever experience life outside the valley?

Entries.reject_868: Oh, it's an arctic shard! That's a very rare magical item.#$b#I'd bring that to the {{Wizard Title}} if I were you!

Entries.Rainy_Day_3: I wonder if the {{Wizard Title}} knows about... this? I hope she can keep a secret.$s

Entries.fall_26: Tonight, after everyone is asleep, that weird old woman who lives in the woods will set up the haunted maze. She always makes sure no one is around to see her working.

Entries.Wizard: Greetings, young adept.^I have enclosed in this package an item of arcane significance. Use it wisely.   ^   -M. {{Wizard Name}}, {{Wizard Title}}%item object 422 1 82 1 84 1 70 1 %%
Entries.wizardJunimoNote: My sources tell me you've been poking around inside the old community center.^Why don't you pay me a visit?^My chambers are west of the forest lake, in the stone tower. I may have information concerning your... 'rat problem'.^   -M. {{Wizard Name}}, {{Wizard Title}} %item quest 1 true %%
Entries.winter_12_1: @-^I am resarching the forgotten art of shadow divination. I require an item known as 'Void Essence'. Bring it to me and you will be rewarded.^ -M. {{Wizard Name}}, {{Wizard Title}} %item quest 111 %%
Entries.winter_5_2: @,^I'm creating an enchanted staff of phenomenal power.^However, I'm missing something: an Iridium Bar.^I'm willing to pay 5x the market value for it. Bring it as soon as you can.^ -M. {{Wizard Name}}, {{Wizard Title}} %item quest 123 %%
Entries.KrobusCrafting: @, I'm not sure how the human message system works, so I asked the {{Wizard Title}} to help me write this letter.^^I hope you are doing okay.^^I wanted to share this with you... it's notes on how my people build a certain item.^^   -Krobus%item craftingRecipe Dark_Sign %%[#]A letter from Krobus
Entries.WizardReward: The specimen you delivered offered great insight into the machinations of the fell beings we call 'monsters'.^^I've formulated a pungent tincture that these beings find intoxicating. Use it with caution...^^   -M. {{Wizard Name}}, {{Wizard Title}}%item craftingRecipe Monster_Musk %%[#]The {{Wizard Title}}'s Discovery
Entries.WizardReward2: Thanks to the ectoplasm you delivered to me, I've made a major breakthrough in the field of arcane engineering.^^Enclosed, you'll find blueprints for a most useful machine...^^   -M. {{Wizard Name}}, {{Wizard Title}}%item craftingRecipe Mini-Obelisk %%[#]The {{Wizard Title}}'s Breakthrough
